import React, { useState } from "react"; export const EditUserPopup = ({ user, onClose, onSave }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(() => ({ Username: user?.Username || "", Email: user?.Email || "", NamaLengkap: user?.Nama_Lengkap || "", Alamat: user?.Alamat || "", RoleID: user?.RoleID || "", })); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData((prev) => ({ ...prev, [name]: value, })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSave(user.UserID, formData); }; return (

Edit User

); };
